attributes.action: Make private landlords and agancy remove the No DSS rule
attributes.additional_details:
At the moment on zoopla the online property site, for the area I'm looking for there is 107 houses to rent and they all say No DSS and if they don't t say this they want you to have a guarantor and for most of us this is not an option.
It's not fair, I no from speaking to lots of people I'm not the only one in this situation.
It's time they make a change
attributes.background:
I'm a single mum, I work full time self employed I get help from housing benefit. I've been trying to find a new house for me and my kids with no luck as very where says no DSS.
I feel this is discrimination and shouldn't be aloud any more

rejection.details:
We've not heard back from you about editing your petition. We therefore need to reject it. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead which is now open on the site: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/226409
